batchchecklayeravailability.name: BatchCheckLayerAvailability
batchchecklayeravailability.description: Grants permission to check the availability of multiple image layers in a specified registry and repository

batchdeleteimage.name: BatchDeleteImage
batchdeleteimage.description: Grants permission to delete a list of specified images within a specified repository

completelayerupload.name: CompleteLayerUpload
completelayerupload.description: Grants permission to inform Amazon ECR that the image layer upload for a specified registry, repository name, and upload ID, has completed

createrepository.name: CreateRepository
createrepository.description: Grants permission to create an image repository

deleterepository.name: DeleteRepository
deleterepository.description: Grants permission to delete an existing image repository

deleterepositorypolicy.name: DeleteRepositoryPolicy
deleterepositorypolicy.description: Grants permission to delete the repository policy from a specified repository

describeimagetags.name: DescribeImageTags
describeimagetags.description: Grants permission to describe all the image tags for a given repository

describeimages.name: DescribeImages
describeimages.description: Grants permission to get metadata about the images in a repository, including image size, image tags, and creation date

describeregistries.name: DescribeRegistries
describeregistries.description: Grants permission to retrieve the catalog data associated with a registry

describerepositories.name: DescribeRepositories
describerepositories.description: Grants permission to describe image repositories in a registry

getauthorizationtoken.name: GetAuthorizationToken
getauthorizationtoken.description: Grants permission to retrieve a token that is valid for a specified registry for 12 hours

getregistrycatalogdata.name: GetRegistryCatalogData
getregistrycatalogdata.description: Grants permission to retrieve the catalog data associated with a registry

getrepositorycatalogdata.name: GetRepositoryCatalogData
getrepositorycatalogdata.description: Grants permission to retrieve the catalog data associated with a repository

getrepositorypolicy.name: GetRepositoryPolicy
getrepositorypolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the repository policy for a specified repository

initiatelayerupload.name: InitiateLayerUpload
initiatelayerupload.description: Grants permission to notify Amazon ECR that you intend to upload an image layer

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for an Amazon ECR resource

putimage.name: PutImage
putimage.description: Grants permission to create or update the image manifest associated with an image

putregistrycatalogdata.name: PutRegistryCatalogData
putregistrycatalogdata.description: Grants permission to create and update the catalog data associated with a registry

putrepositorycatalogdata.name: PutRepositoryCatalogData
putrepositorycatalogdata.description: Grants permission to update the catalog data associated with a repository

setrepositorypolicy.name: SetRepositoryPolicy
setrepositorypolicy.description: Grants permission to apply a repository policy on a specified repository to control access permissions

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag an Amazon ECR resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to untag an Amazon ECR resource

uploadlayerpart.name: UploadLayerPart
uploadlayerpart.description: Grants permission to upload an image layer part to Amazon ECR Public
